sw.explainerSubtitle: Studio Yako Binafsi ya Stika za AI
sw.explainerIntroTitle: Badilisha picha yoyote kuwa pakiti ya stika za kufurahisha.
sw.explainerIntroP: Pakia picha ya rafiki, mnyama, au mhusika umpendaye, na ruhusu AI yetu ikutengenezee seti nzima ya stika maalum. Ni haraka, rahisi, na ina ubunifu usio na mwisho!
sw.step1P: Chagua picha iliyo wazi ya mtu, mnyama, au mhusika. Unaweza kuikata ili iwe kamili.
sw.step2P: Chagua mtindo wa kisanii, chagua rangi ya usuli, au uifanye iwe wazi.
sw.step3P: Tumia misemo yetu ya kawaida kama "Nzuri sana" au ongeza yako mwenyewe.
sw.step4P: Bofya "Tengeneza" na uone maajabu. Pakua stika moja kwa moja au kama faili ya .zip.
sw.featureAI: ‚ú® Uzalishaji kwa AI: Inatumia Gemini ya Google kuunda stika za ubora wa juu.
sw.featureStyles: üé® Mitindo Mbalimbali ya Kisanii: Chagua kutoka Uhalisia, Uhuishaji, au Muundo wa 3D.
sw.featureCrop: ‚úÇÔ∏è Ukataji Picha Rahisi: Lenga hasa unachotaka kwenye stika yako.
sw.featureTransparency: üëª Uwazi wa Hali ya Juu: Mfumo wetu huondoa usuli wa miraba kwa uwazi halisi.
sw.featureCustomize: ‚úèÔ∏è Inabadilishwa Kikamilifu: Ongeza, ondoa, na hariri misemo ili kuunda pakiti kamilifu.
sw.featureSave: üíæ Hifadhi Kipindi Chako: Mipangilio na misemo yako huhifadhiwa kwenye kivinjari chako.
sw.featureBulk: üì¶ Upakuaji wa Pamoja: Pata stika zako zote kwenye faili moja ya .zip.
sw.creatorStep1: Pakia, bandika, au piga picha ya mtu, mnyama, au mhusika.
sw.creatorStep3: Tengeneza Stika na uangalie AI ikitengeneza pakiti ya kipekee!
sw.uploadPlaceholder: Gusa ili upakie, piga picha, au ubandike picha (Ctrl+V)
sw.resultsInfo: Hizi hapa stika zako. Ongeza zaidi, au zipakue moja kwa moja au zote kwa pamoja!
sw.cropInfo: Chagua sehemu ya picha unayotaka kugeuza kuwa stika.
sw.chooseSourceTitle: Chagua Chanzo cha Picha (au bandika na Ctrl+V)
sw.errorCamera: Imeshindwa kufikia kamera. Tafadhali angalia ruhusa.
sw.errorInvalidFile: Tafadhali chagua faili sahihi ya picha (k.m., PNG, JPG, GIF).
sw.errorNeedExpression: Tafadhali ongeza angalau msemo mmoja ili kutengeneza stika.
sw.errorMajor: Samahani, hitilafu kubwa imetokea. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
sw.errorExpressionExists: Msemo wenye jina la "{label}" tayari upo.
sw.confirmRestore: Una uhakika unataka kurejesha misemo na mipangilio yote ya awali? Kitendo hiki kitafuta kipindi chako cha sasa.

en.explainerIntroTitle: Turn any photo into a fun, shareable sticker pack.
en.explainerIntroP: Upload a picture of a friend, a pet, or your favorite character, and let our AI generate a whole set of custom stickers for you. It's fast, easy, and endlessly creative!
en.howItWorksTitle: How It Works in 4 Simple Steps
en.step1P: Choose a clear photo of a person, pet, or character. You can crop it to perfection.
en.step2P: Select an artistic style, choose a background color, or make it transparent.
en.step3P: Use our default expressions like "Thumbs up" or add your own custom ones.
en.step4P: Click "Generate" and watch the magic happen. Download stickers one by one or as a .zip file.
en.featureAI: ‚ú® AI-Powered Generation: Uses Google's Gemini to create high-quality, expressive stickers.
en.featureStyles: üé® Multiple Artistic Styles: Choose from Photo-realistic, Anime, or 3D Render.
en.featureCrop: ‚úÇÔ∏è Easy Image Cropping: Focus on exactly what you want in your sticker.
en.featureTransparency: üëª Advanced Transparency: Our smart algorithm removes checkerboard backgrounds for true transparency.
en.featureCustomize: ‚úèÔ∏è Fully Customizable: Add, remove, and edit expressions to create the perfect pack.
en.featureSave: üíæ Save Your Session: Your settings and expressions are saved in your browser for next time.
en.featureBulk: üì¶ Bulk Download: Get all your stickers in a convenient .zip file.
en.creatorStep1: Upload, paste, or take a photo of a person, pet, or character.
en.creatorStep3: Generate Stickers and watch the AI create a unique pack!
en.uploadPlaceholder: Tap to upload, take a photo, or paste an image (Ctrl+V)
en.resultsInfo: Here are your generated stickers. Add more, or download them individually or all at once!
en.cropInfo: Select the portion of the image you want to turn into a sticker.
en.chooseSourceTitle: Choose Image Source (or paste with Ctrl+V)
en.errorCamera: Could not access the camera. Please check permissions.
en.errorInvalidFile: Please select a valid image file (e.g., PNG, JPG, GIF).
en.errorNeedExpression: Please add at least one expression to generate stickers.
en.errorMajor: Sorry, a major error occurred while creating the stickers. Please try again.
en.errorExpressionExists: An expression with the label "{label}" already exists.
en.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore all default expressions and settings? This action will clear your current session.
